name: Ziz, the Bird that Envelopes the Sky
text:
Evolution GG2. (If there are no evolution counters on thi card, put an evolution counter on it.)
As long as there are one or more evolution counters on this card, it gains [+300/+300] and Flying.
Whenever an evolution counter is put on this card, you may put an evolution counter on taret resonator with no evolution counters on it.
